verse:
तमीश्वराणां परमं महेश्वरं तं देवतानां परमं च दैवतम्‌।
पतिं पतीनां परमं परस्ताद्‌विदाम देवं भुवनेशमीड्यम्‌॥
meaning: Meaning:The supreme Lord of the lords of darkness, the great Lord Shiva, is the supreme deity of the gods and the divine. He is the husband of all husbands and is considered the highest deity by the wise. He is worthy of worship as the lord of the world.
